Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can illustrate the problem of people needing to communicate over long distances using a string telephone.
The student can include in their drawing how the string telephone uses sound to relay information between students.
The student can demonstrate in the drawing that the device can send or receive information over a given distance.
The student can depict using only the materials (string, cups, etc.) provided when creating the string telephone.
The student can show that the string telephone effectively solves the communication problem over distance.
The student can illustrate how using the string telephone helps people communicate over long distances.
